nodes.text: Star Wars Tales #18 is the eighteenth issue in the Star Wars Tales series of comics. It was published on December 24, 2003 by Dark Horse Comics.

Throughout the galaxy there is one name that can send a chill through the core of any wanted man. That word is FETT. Join us for a full-issue tribute to the most feared and respected bounty hunter of all time — BOBA FETT. From stories of Boba's exciting childhood with his father Jango, through tales of him tracking down and bringing in wanted men, Star Wars Tales #18 is a thrill-a-minute, action-packed issue that will excite both young and old alike!
